list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a building with sails or vanes that turn in the wind and generate power to grind grain into flour.
(with reference to a person's arms) move or be moved around in a circle in a manner suggestive of the rotating sails or vanes of a windmill.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Penny slipped, windmilled her arms, and somehow kept her balance
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Penny trượt, cánh tay của cô, và bằng cách nào đó giữ thăng bằng
